mapper.select: SELECT u.userName, r.replySeq, r.postSeq, r.replyDate, r.replyContent, r.userId FROM reply r JOIN itdauser u on r.userId = u.userId WHERE postSeq = #{postSeq} ORDER BY r.createDate DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TIMELINEREPLY (replySeq, postSeq, replyDate, replyContent, userId) VALUES (replySeq.NEXTVAL, #{postSeq}, SYSDATE, #{replyContent}, #{userId})
